meanings.sent1: The depravity of his actions shocked everyone in the town.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper reported on the depravity of the criminal's behavior.
meanings.sent3: Despite his depravity, he somehow managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The depravity of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over the community.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the depravity of the villain in a chillingly realistic manner.

meanings.definition: A morally corrupt act or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The depravity of the theft left the shop owner devastated.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the depravity of the lie he told.
meanings.sent3: The depravity of the prank was so outrageous that even the teacher had to laugh.
meanings.sent4: His depravity in cheating on the test was like a stain on his reputation.
meanings.sent5: The depravity of his betrayal was felt by all who trusted him.
